example.text: I'm grateful to stand alongside [[user]] in New York today. It's time for Kevin McCarthy and House Republicans to quit posturing, stop threatening the full faith and credit of the United States, and do their jobs. [[url]]

I'm joining a bipartisan team of senators to create a 9/11 Commission-style COVID-19 Task Force to investigate the pandemic's causes and examine its effects. We must learn the lessons from this pandemic to prepare ourselves for the next one. [[url]]

Students can’t learn if they’re hungry. So today, I went to [[user]] to announce my EATS Act, which would expand SNAP eligibility to qualifying college students so they can focus on their studies and prepare themselves for an even brighter future. [[url]]

Shoring up cybersecurity Amidst a rise in cyberattacks from foreign adversaries, Kirsten is introducing bipartisan legislation to help the US work with allies and partners to guard against cyber threats from Iran and other hostile cyber actors. The Abraham Accords Cybersecurity Cooperation Act would authorize cybersecurity cooperation between the US and the Abraham Accords countries - Israel, Morocco, the United Arab Emirates, and Bahrain - to enhance security in the region and protect our critical infrastructure.

Students can’t learn if they’re hungry. So today, I went to [[user]] to announce my EATS Act, which would expand SNAP eligibility to qualifying college students so they can focus on their studies and prepare themselves for an even brighter future. [[url]]
